trans-unit.source: In an upcoming version of the software this page will list all newly added or revised content that requires translation.
(warning: this form is active, click 'cancel' after translating)
Add container links (duplicate links will be ignored)
Sorry, you do not have permission to make %1% language translations
Sorry, you do not have permission to access that page
Did you type the URL correctly?
Did you follow a broken link?
The existing term values are required by the application to operate correctly
trans-unit.target: 기존 용어값은 어플리케이션의 정상 작동에 필요합니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the website for display in the header
A brief site description or "tagline" for the header
trans-unit.target: 헤더 부분을 위한 간략한 사이트 설명 혹은 태그라인

trans-unit.source: The current version of the application
The destination directory for uploaded digital object files
trans-unit.target: 업로드된 디지털 객체 파일의 대상 디렉토리

trans-unit.source: The maximum width for derived reference images
The number of records shown per page on list pages
trans-unit.target: 목록 페이지에 페이지당 보여지는 기록의 수

trans-unit.source: When set to "yes", the reference code string will be built using the information object identifier plus the identifiers of all its ancestors
trans-unit.target: "yes"로 설정하면 정보객체 식별자에 그 어미 객체의 식별자를 더하여 참조코드 문자열이 구축될 것이다.

trans-unit.source: When set to "no", the repository name is excluded from certain displays because it will be too repetitive
trans-unit.target: "no"로 설정하면 보존소 이름이 반복적이기 때문에 특정 디스플레이에서 배제됨

trans-unit.source: This value must be at least %min% pixels
This value can not be greater than %max% pixels
You must show at least %min% hits per page
trans-unit.target: 페이지당 최소 %min% 검색일치 결과를 보여주어야 한다.

trans-unit.source: You cannot show more than %max% hits per page
trans-unit.target: 페이지당 %max% 이상 검색일치 결과를 보여줄 수 없다.

trans-unit.source: Add an alpha-numeric code to uniquely identify this particular OAI repository within its network domain to create a unique, OAI-compliant identifier, e.g. oai:foo.org:repositorycode_10001
trans-unit.target: 유일한 OAI 준수 식별자, 즉, oai:foo.org:repositorycode_10001를 생성하기 위해서 네트워크 도메인 안에 있는 이러한 특정한 OAI 보존소를 구별해서 식별하기 위해 알파베트-숫자 코드를 추가하라

trans-unit.source: The number of entities to include in a single OAI response list before inserting a resumption token
trans-unit.target: 재개 토큰을 삽입하기 전에 단일한 OAI 대응 리스트 안에 포함되는 개체 수

trans-unit.source: This value must be at least %min%
This value cannot be more than %max%
The code can only contain letters and numbers
trans-unit.target: 코드는 문자와 숫자로만 구성될 수 있음

trans-unit.source: ISAD(G), 2nd ed. International Council on Archives
RAD, July 2008 version. Canadian Council of Archives
Dublin Core, Version 1.1. Dublin Core Metadata Initiative
ISAAR(CPF), 2nd ed. International Council on Archives
ISDIAH, 1st ed. International Council on Archives
View children as a compound digital object?
Hierarchical list of menus for the site, first column
Sorry, OAI harvesting is disabled for this system.
MODS, Version 3.3. U.S. Library of Congress
trans-unit.target: MODS, 3.3판. 미국 의회도서관 메타데이터 객체 기술스키마

trans-unit.source: Click here to return to harvester main page
Repository could not be added because it already exists.
Errors while trying to add Repository
When set to "yes", this system will act as an OAI repository and respond to OAI harvesting requests
trans-unit.target: "yes"로 설정하면 이 시스템은 OAI 보존소처럼 행동하고 OAI 수확 요청에 대응할 것이다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether to sort siblings in the information object treeview control and, if so, what sort criteria to use
trans-unit.target: 정보 객체 트리보기(treeview) 제어에서 자식형제를 분류할 수 있는지를 결정하고 만약 그렇다면 사용할 분류 기준을 결정하라.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete %1%?
Sorry, this Term is locked and cannot be deleted
trans-unit.target: 이 용어는 잠겨있으며 삭제될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: File %1% could not be moved to %2%
Select a digital object to upload
Provide an internal menu name. This is not visible to users.
Provide a menu label for users. For menu items that are not visible (i.e. are organizational only) this should be left blank.
Provide a link to an external website or an internal, symfony path (module/action).
Provide a brief description of the menu and it's purpose.

This is a non-preferred term and cannot be edited - please use %2%.

Click Confirm to delete this physical storage from the system. This will also remove the physical storage location from the following records:

Enable or disable the display of certain page elements. Unless they have been overridden by a specific theme, these settings will be used site wide.

or Auto-generate a new representation from master image
The "%dd%" placeholder will be replaced with a incremental number (e.g. 'image 01', 'image 02')
This file couldn\\'t be uploaded because of file size upload limits

Enter free-text information, including qualifiers or typographical symbols to express uncertainty, to change the way the date displays. If this field is not used, the default will be the start and end years only.

Enter the end year. Do not use any qualifiers or typographical symbols to express uncertainty. If the start and end years are the same, enter data only in the "Date" field and leave the "End date" blank.
Enter the start year. Do not use any qualifiers or typographical symbols to express uncertainty.

Use the actor name field to link an authority record to this description. Search for an existing name in the authority records by typing the first few characters of the name. Alternatively, type a new name to create and link to a new authority record.
Search for an existing term in the places taxonomy by typing the first few characters of the term name. Alternatively, type a new term to create and link to a new place term.
Are you sure you want to delete %1% and all its descendants?
Enter a valid URI (e.g. http://www.example.com/oai) for an OAI-PMH repository

"Record, when relevant, the start and the end date of the relationship." (ISDF 6.3) Enter the date as you would like it to appear in the show page for the function, using qualifiers and/or typographical symbols to express uncertainty if desired.
Describe the nature of the relationship between the function and the related resource. (ISDF 6.2)
Name - A term with this name already exists.

Make it at least six characters
Make it different from your username
